remarks: Change bound variable in an extended sum.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jun-2017.)
statement:
cbvesum.1 $e |- ( j = k -> B = C ) $.
cbvesum.2 $e |- F/_ k A $.
cbvesum.3 $e |- F/_ j A $.
cbvesum.4 $e |- F/_ k B $.
cbvesum.5 $e |- F/_ j C $.
cbvesum $p |- sum* j e. A B = sum* k e. A C $.
$d j k $.
